Source: DVDSCR to mp4 Encode
Encode:
well, 4 days earlier than last year!!!
got that Encode from the disc,quality was still nice, had security stuff upfront 
--> removed video had a 3 line security msg text at the bottom, nothing we 
haven't read before
2 lines were in the black bar area below so they got cropped away anyway
1 line is still showin 3 times during the movie, near start,1h,2h mark. nothing fancy, besides that clear screener
Video was a bit dark and not that sharp, so i added brightness, sharpness,
contrast, and enhanced colours a bit
Resolution was 640x3something and not 720x304 when i got it, so no reason for me 
to upscale it, would only loose more quality
didnt go for HQ Tag, since i couldnt do it from the original disc myself
if i do get the full disc i will do a HQ version again, but i doubt it will show 
up anywhere
Audio was sweet English Stereo, nothing to do on that part
got nice and will do me till i get full disc or retail
enjoy


::Greetz and Respect::


ALL CREDIT Goes to HIVE for Encoding and ABG for Distribution.
